column4: Does either Evolution or Thunderbird support Exchange 5.5?  and No, the Exchange does not support IMAP.
thnx, but IMAP does not appear to be supported on the Exchange server I'm trying to connect to... at least when I telnet domainXXX 143 I'm getting a connection refused err.
